<a id="VScrollBar"></a>

# VScrollBar

**Inherits:** [ScrollBar](ScrollBar.md) **\<** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A vertical scrollbar that goes from top (min) to bottom (max).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A vertical scrollbar, typically used to navigate through content that extends beyond the visible height of a control. It is a [Range](Range.md)-based control and goes from top (min) to bottom (max). Note that this direction is the opposite of [VSlider](VSlider.md)'s.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
